# EKAlarmProximity.none

**Case**

The alarm has no proximity trigger.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Constants

- **EKAlarmProximity.enter**: The alarm is set to fire when entering a region.
- **EKAlarmProximity.leave**: The alarm is set to fire when leaving a region.

items.description: The alarm is set to fire when entering a region.
